title: Jhin not gaining attack speed from items
body: In my last game as Jhin I was unable to raise my attack speed beyond .75. I purchased 4 recurve bows and a few daggers to test this. Has anyone else had this issue with Jhin?

replies.body:
No we must, he could be the next Faker of NA.
*dripping tons of sarcasm right now*
DEATH IN 4 ACTS: Jhin's basic attacks use ammunition and his attack speed cannot be improved except through growth by level-up.
Did you even read his passive.
how is this supposed to be art? WHILE YOU ARE FAILING TO KNOW HIS PASSIVE?
I am 90% sure this is a troll post...
Idk man, alot of people are stupid as hell. There's a very good chance he's serious about this.
Your kidding right? Did you even read his Passive?

Yea just take second look at his passive. 
It's a fucking Essay.
Bring a dictionary.
Wow, and I thought the {{champion:412}} {{item:3302}} bug threads are the dumbest one I've read.
